title: Crime Alert 12.12.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert 12.12.18
description:
High school football player arrested after pregnant cheerleader’s body found in dumpster. New report details the painstaking process of retrieving Chris Watts' two daughters from enormous oil drums. Sonic Drive-In staff stashes ecstasy pill in kid’s meal served to 4-year-old boy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
